aai-locales.label: AAI Max structures per tick
aai-locales.description: Improve UPS by restricting how many structures can be processed each frame. Higher values means more potential UPS strain, 0 means unlimited. If choosing 0 then it may be worth limiting structures in other ways, such as by cutting power to structures when they are not needed, or sending signals in pulses instead of constantly.

aai-locales.label: This cannot be mined while anyone is in it or the AI is switched on.
aai-locales.description: This cannot be mined while anyone is in it or the AI is switched on.

aai-locales.label: Start with Unit Remote Controller
aai-locales.description: Start with a free Unit Remote Controller

aai-locales.label: Hand-Deployed Vehicles: AI Default Setting
aai-locales.description: Which AI setting should vehicles default to when deployed by hand.

aai-locales.label: Players start with a random color
aai-locales.description: Players spawn with a random color.

aai-locales.label: Path Visualisation
aai-locales.description: Enable path visualisation showing where units are going.

aai-locales.label: Starting Crash Sequence
aai-locales.description: Uncheck to deactivate the crash sequence at the start of the game. Has no effect once the game has already started.

aai-locales.label: Start with Mining Vehicle MK1
aai-locales.description: Start with a free Mining Vehicle MK1

aai-locales.label: Mining Vehicle: Mining Speed Multiplier
aai-locales.description: A multiplier to the mining speed of mining vehicles. Setting a value of 50 means the vehicles mine at half speed.
